author: hwright
msg: Add notification support for changelist operations.
svn_wc_notify_changelist_clear enum values for setting and clearing
(svn_wc_notify_t): Add changelist_name field for reporting the name
(svn_client_set_changelist): Use the notification callback to report
(svn_cl__changelist): Get a notifier to use for changelist operations.

author: danderson
msg: Merge r22209, r23018 from trunk to the 1.4.x branch.

author: jpeacock
msg: Doesn't work with svk at the moment.

author: jpeacock
msg: Make many functions added since version 1.0 in the Client API visible
to users of the Perl bindings. They are already swig-wrapped, just not
Export more API functions, and refactor to avoid unnecessary repetition.
